thread.title: Tour de France: ride the Tour's most epic climbs
thread.title_full: Tour de France: ride the Tour's most epic climbs

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Tour de France: ride the Tour's most epic climbs
text:
Dust off your lycra and follow Froome and Contador up one of these colossal ascents. 
-- 
10. Col d'Ausbisque 
The Col d'Ausbisque has featured in the Tour more times than any other mountain bar the Col du Tourmalet, though doesn't appear in this year's edition. It lies in the Pyrenees, and is around 20 miles from Pau. The town will appeal to foodies and shoppers, and boasts a decent museum. 
From Laruns
